title: A home away from home ðŸ™‚
text: We stayed Ã¡t Lincolns Backpackers during our Asia trip for about 10 days around Christmas. The place was full of adventurious travellers. The owner Lincoln is super friendly, we could turn to him any time. The hostel itself is brand new with clean bathrooms. The location is very central, there many restaurants just a stone throw away. I can only recommend this hostel!

title: Great food if you have time
text: Had a great lunch here in the middle of the summer. The food we ordered was fresh and delicious with a taste of greek cuisine, but we had to make more than 1 hour for our meal, with allows me no more than 4*

title: Must see in Athens and in the whole country
text: A must visit place in Athens that has a huse history. Be prepared when on a sunny day, it can be crasy hot on the top. Not sure it worths 20 euros, but as it very old, its ok to visit.

title: Restaurant with a good athmosphere
text: Nice restaurant which serves fresh food only about 20 minutes walk from of Hill Lycabettus. It also has Street tables for people watching

title: Great gyros
text: We had a great gyros at this place with local flavours followed by an also local beer, what else would you need

title: Nice place for a drink above the city
text: Central location, kind staff, delicious cocktails, nothing to complain about, nice place to spend time with friends

title: Downtown capsule type hostel
text: Location is good, rooms and rest rooms were clean, aircon cooled the temperature nicely. We arrived around 11pm, there was no problem checking in. They serve breakfast, not with Michelin star, but at least something to start the day with.

title: 5* restaurant with great food in the center
text: Right in the heart of the city you can find this family owned restaurant. The chef lady is extremely kind, and her meals are always fresh and delicious. We have eaten here multiple times, never left disappointed. It is also clean, and they speak english.

title: Great place to stay
text: A bit off the center, but the staff is very kind, we arrived at 6am, and we could get is our room. Breakfast is not too much, but at least something. They have bikes to discover the area, and also able to organize boat trip to the lake.

title: Top destination around Luang Prabang
text: Very nice series of waterfalls about 50-60 minutes away from town. Entrance is 20k per person. There are many operators offer trips for 30-40k with airconned minivans.

title: If you dont mind no aircon and shared bathroom, its a good place
text: If you dont mind no aircon and shared bathroom, its a good place. Water refill station is available, markets, temples and mountain in the center of town are all walking distance. As some windows open to the street, it is not the most silent in the morning

title: Great hotel in Siem Reap
text: Location a little bit off the center, but Grab is 2 usd. They offered free airport pickup, organized tuktuk to discover Angkor, had a great breakfast, their pool is clean and refreshing, WiFi perfect. 5*

title: Good location, good price, good food
text: Had eaten here twice, left both occasions satisfied. Ladies are kind, food came quickly and deliciosly, prices are correct. 5*

title: Basic place but good location
text: Place is close to center and airport. If you are full of activites during your stay it is a perfect place to save money. WiFi is good, but bathroom is in a separate area. The ladies are very kind and helpful. They have water to refill, so you dont have to use more plastic

title: Great, authentic place to stay
text:
A bit far from the center, but thats the only negative point. WiFi is ok, nice common area
Staff is kind, helpful. They helped organized scooter, laundry and transport.
Cottages are nice and protected from moscitos.

title: Central restaurant in San V
text: We had a fish & chips and a Pork sisig here. We were told, that the waiting is long, and it was indeed, about 30min. The price is a bit too high for the size of the portion, and the chips wasnt really ready when they served it, it is far from 5*

title: Nice restaurant close to the center of SV
text: We had a carbonara and a pizza with extra cheese here. The food arrived with about 10 min difference. We found the pasta delicious, but the pizza did not taste good, and also had belly troubles from it the other day. Dont know if I was too sensitive (im not) or something was wrong with the cheeses, but cannot five 5*

title: Enjoy, it was expensive! ðŸ˜ƒ
text: We were told by locals fancy new skyscrapers, great bridges, colorful lights, specially recommended after sunset.

title: Great piece of transport history
text: And also a great way to get around, or at least one side to the other of Hongkong. Its price is very little

title: Great value for price!
text:
Had one of the best meals in this restaurant during our stay in Hongkong.
Location is Central, food is perfect, staff is kind.

title: Great center Square of the city
text: We visited the place around chinese new year, and it was decorated beautifuly. Center location, good restaurants around

title: Great peace of history
text: Nice ruins in the heart of Macau. The steps in front of it are full of people during the night, and relaxing when its dark outside. Must see in Macau

title: Very fancy way to arrive to the casino ðŸ™‚
text: Great new attraction, you can go to the casino by a cable car. It is free, and as you fly above the outdoor lake, you can enjoy music during the fountain show

title: Great Japanese Restaurant in the heart of Footscray
text: Central location, very delicious food, big porton. We had Teriyaki Don and Curry Don, Both fine. Recommended

title: Very nice restaurant
text: Great Roasted Chicken and duck. Restaurant is located within the Red Garden. English speaking informative staff, delicious fresh food

title: Budget hotel with nice pool
text:
There are many restaurants around the hotel, and the beach is also walking distance. Pool was nice, even tho some kids came to play in it at 6am.
Breakfast is good, staff is able to organized scooter rental or transfers.

title: Basic hotel with pool, close to the airport
text:
Advantages: close to the airport, so perfect if you have an early flight.
They have a pool. The staff is helpful, we were able to check in a little before 2pm
Bad points: bedsheets and bathtub looked dirty.

title: Good local restaurant
text: Great local eatery in the heart of Senggigi. Local food is fresh and delicious, the variety is satisfying

title: Nice local restaurant with ocean view
text: Good location, nice view to the ocean. Tried top local food nasi goreng. It felt a bit oily, but was delicious and coused to problem later

title: Good restaurant with central location
text: Read the reviews and were afraid to try it, but we ended up leaving with good experience every time we visited. Food was all the time good quality, beer cold, and the view to the ocean and to the volcano in Lombok is stunning

title: Great attraction
text: Very good daytrip option from Kandy, but also ok to do for 2 days together with other sights. Nice view from here to Sigiriya Rock. Take eniught water and wear proper shoes!

title: Great place to eat in Gili T
text: Our place was right next to the restaurant, so we visited it many times during our stay in Gili T. The waiters were kind, the food was always fresh and good quality, waiting time is short, the athmosphere is welcoming. Price are also all right

title: Great place to chill and enjoy the view
text: Great place to enjoy the view of the cliffs and the different formations. You can make quite a walk around the whole area. Parking fee is 5k,there are reataurants and rest rooms on the way. Make sure to go early as it gets very crowded

title: Nice Cliff formation
text: Beautiful Cliff formation thst surroinds a beach. Make sure you get there as early as possible to beat the heat and the hundreds of turists. Prepared for the bumpy roads

title: Great quality food close the coast
text: The restaurant is located close to the coast, you can stop here on the way. Food quality is good, meal got ready quick, only reason for the 4* is that the staff felt bored and didnt make us wanna stay any longer than necessary

title: Wanted to give 4*, but 2 is better
text:
There was about 1 hour delay, there was some miscommunication, but would still have given 4*, but they thrown my backpack to the beach and it got full sandy and wet with all my clothes in it, so maximum 2*
Was also extreme hot inside the boat on the way

title: Clean and delicious
text: We have eaten here many times during our stay in Nusa Penida, and left satisfied at every occasions. Staff is kind, food is delicious, beer is almost same price as in the shop next to it.

title: 5* restaurant
text: We have eaten here many times during our stay in Nusa Penida, and never had an issue with them. It was scary at first as the restaurant was empty, but the food hygiene was perfect any time we visited.

title: Place to rest close to the airport
text: We only stayed here for 1 night before we took our flight in the morning. The building is not the newest, but it was clean and the aircon was working just fine. Little breakfast, and extremely kind host. Airport is 10min on foot!

title: Nice place to relax on the island
text: Stayed here for 2 nights on the beginning of December. The rooms were clean, aircon was ok, staff was helpful and informative. At breakfast there was many options to choose from, so the morning started well and with full belly

title: Where the action happens
text: For socializing one of the best place you can be in Labuan Bajo. There were many backpackers, enjoying a beer, having chats, playing table tennis or pool. Breakfast is includes, and the staff is helpful and informative. We had no aircon tho, and even if the bedsheets smelled clean, they looked dirty and had stains on them, so it is only maximum 4*

title: Great new place with pool
text: Didnt stay here, Just visited for a dinner and the pool. The staff is kind,the place is brand new and clean. Felt good to have a cold beer by the pool and the sunset is also nice from here. Kitchen is also fresh and delicious

title: Great restaurant
text: When we arrive here for lunch the restaurant was empty. The view is nice to the harbour. The quality of the food was excellent. I ordered nasi gorent with tuna, it was fresh and delicious.

title: Good value authentic restaurant
text: Good value authentic restaurant in the edge of the center of Labuan Bajo. Have eaten here 3 times during our stay, tried different meals, were always satisfied with the quality as the food was fresh and delicious. Price are good as it mostly caters for locals

title: Great day trip from Labuan Bajo to a nice waterfall
text: Great day trip from Labuan Bajo to a nice Waterfall. Probably doable without a local guide, but for 30-50k / person you can hire someone local who knows a shortcut. +50k per person for entrance fee. The road from LB is 1 hour on normal road and 30min the last 6km on complete crap. Mixture of putholes and dirtroad, be prepared. The Waterfall however is beautiful and refreshing. Only 4* for the sbad road there

title: Very good value close to airport
text: Very relaxing hotel, Just 2.5 km from the airport. Pool is cool, staff is helpful and kind, breakfast is good and it costs 30k/person, they have laundry service 10k/kg, internet, aircon. Kuta Beach is also 10 min on foot

title: Cultural beauty close to Kuta
text: The temple itself is no big beal, but the whole area is lovely. There many little stores around where locals sell their souvenirs.

title: Great restaurant in the heart of Tanah lot
text: Great restaurant with aircon in the hot Tanah lot. Staff is kind and helpful, food comes quickly and it is delicious, good quality. There are happy hour deals too

title: A place to stay with great athmosphere
text: Place is close to the beach. Staff is helpful and kind. Their kitchen is very delicious. They welcome us with fruit and tea. Bungalows are clean, aircon working, internet perfect, cannot complain, cant give anything else than 5*

title: Great place to stay close to waterfalls and temples
text: The place is only a very short ride away from the main road. Apartments and bathroom are clean and well equipped. Owner is kind, and the dinner/breakfast is also very delicious. Pura Ulun Danu temple and many waterfalls are close, so good place to start discovering the area.

title: Only visited the place for lunch, but 5* can be given
text: Stayed in a Homestay not too far, met a lady there who recommended this place for its good kitchen. We checked out and did not disappoint. Food was fresh and delicious, it was accompanied with a great view into the valley.

title: Homestay with very kind and helpful staff
text: We stayed in Poni for 3 nights during our stay in Brunei. They offered airport pickup, and a lot of information to make our stay easier while we were there. The place without car is a bit far from the capital or the airport, but they can arrange transport too. There are good restaurants nearby, room is air conditioned, but bed is a bit old, so not too confy. Only 4 stars for the distance and the bed. 5* for the staff and the place itself.

title: Clean room with great pool ðŸ™‚
text: The hotel is located 4 train stops from KL Sentral, 5min from train station. Check in process is good if you are in time. Stuff kind and helpful. Rooms are clean, and the best of the whole place is the infinity pool on the 37th

title: Nice and clean place a bit OFF the center
text: Location is only 4* as it is a bit OFF from the Fort, but with tuktuk its only 10min, but everything else is 5*. Rooms were clean, aircon working ok, monkeys playing on the trees next to house, nice view from the balcony.

title: Nice stay at Dambulla
text: The place is a bit far from the center, but at lease its quiet. The room was clean, we asked for lunch and breakfast which were delicious and plenty. The owner is kind and informative. He had a scooter which is available for renting. We used it to see the Sigiriya.

title: Nice place for value
text:
The place is a bit far from the stations, but if you know the buses, you can get here for 0.1usd .
Its price was ok, the breakfast they provided was delicious and plenty. Laundry service also available. The groundfloor rooms are a bit older, try to stay on the top floor
Close to the Lake, close to the temple of tooth

title: Place for good price and great view!
text: The place is on the top of the hill, so the view to the Ella Rock, Little adams peak and the Waterfall is amazing. The owner is very kind, he serves delicious traditional SrÃ­ lankan breakfast. Only reason for the 4* is that it is very difficult to find. (and there was no internet)

title: Place with a good price, for 10min Walk from the center
text: You have to Walk a little or take a tuktuk. There was fÃ¡n in our room and mosquito net on the bed. They had laundry service for 600 (i think it depends on the weight) but our clothes were on the floor, not in a drying machine. The bathroom is not the most modern, and not too clean.

title: Great restaurant in Mirissa
text:
Visited this restaurant many Times during our stay in Sri Lanka. Had breakfast, lunch and dinner here also. Every time we left will full belly and good mood, food quality and staff is also 5*
Chocolate kottu and avocado juice is recommended

title: Great restaurant in Dambulla
text: Family run restaurant in the outskirt of Dambulla. For 750 you can have all you can eat of various delicious meals. Quality is also good, plus we received fruit as a desszert.

title: Great restaurant by the Lake of Kandy
text: Had meals here more Times, tried traditional SrÃ­ LankÃ¡n food, always left in good mood and full belly.

title: Great experience of accomodation in the heart of Petra (Wadi Musa)
text: Hostel with new concept and great view to the city. Stuff is friendly and helpful, breakfast is good, location is also central- Nice starting point to discover Petra, and there are many shops and restaurants around.

title: Restaurant with central location
text:
The prices are higher than the average in Jordan. The food was OK, but not superb.
On our bill we had other items we did not order.
The location is central

title: Great daytrip from Amman
text:
Great place to see Roman ruins in good condition.
Only less than 1 hour from Amman. Take the bus from North Station of Amman for 1,3JOD. Once there, make sure you have protection against the strong sun.
No restaurants within the ruins, but plenty in the city of Jerash.

title: Great restaurant-street in the heart of Amman
text: Great street to hang out with locals and tourists. Full of coffees and restaurants. During Ramadan, most of them are closed during the day.

title: Good place to try local food
text: Visited this restaurant during ramadan for dinner. We had the chance to try local food and eat it with local people. The staff spoke english, the prices are average.

title: Nice peace of history in the heart of Amman
text: Great ruins to visit in the center of Amman. It can be pretty hot during the day, so plan ahead. Accessible with Jordan pass

title: Great Hostel with good location
text:
Stayed here for 2 nights, the social life of the hostel is good, table tennis, pool and a bar helps you make new friends. Breakfast wasnt big deal, but enjoyed the pencake morning. Location is OK, walking distance from the harbour.
bar closes at 10pm (I think), so sleep quality is also OK

title: Nice view if the weather is clean!
text: The Natural Park is not the cheapest, and if the weather isnt clear, you dont see a thing. But if you are lucky enoght, you can easily spend a day within the gates, in that case yo will see nature as its best :) In that case, the entrance fee is OK :)

title: Great place to hike and seals
text:
Stayed in Hout Bay for a couple of nights. Chapmans peak drive and hike are amazing, and the starting point for the seal island is from here.
Amazing place

title: Fine restaurant with good location
text:
We had a nice dinner here with friends, we tried different meal, everyone was satisfied. One of us asked pasta with no chili, but received it with extra chili :D But we told the waiter and they prepared a new one for us.
Prices are OK, the restaurant itself is OK, food is delicion.

title: Great hike
text:
Great hike that offers amazing view on the way up. It is steep, there arent many shadow on the way up, but once in the top, it can be very chilly and windy, so be prepared for everything :)
But once you are in the top, you will see that it was worthwile :)
placeLocation: Table Mountain National Park, South Africa

title: Great place to stay
text:
We stayed 2 places in this very pleasant place. The owner of the place was kind and informative, his dogs were great :D
Area is safe, and good spot to start dscovering Hout Bay and South CP area. Swimming pool, clear and well equipped apartments.

title: Nice place with kind staff
text: The place was clean and tidy, kitchen well equipped, receptionists kind, welcoming and informative. Not much to do in Struisbaai, but L'Agulhas is very close, where you have things to do or see, and the road there alng the ocean(s) are beautiful, and offers pretty sunsets.

title: Average restaurant in the party district in Budapets
text: We had a dinner here with a voucher. Location is good, the restaurant itself is average, the food is a bit above average, waiting time is OK.

title: Nice place with good atmosphere
text: Cosy hostel in Plettenberg Bay. The stuff was informative, the rooms are clean. There is a bar, TV, balcony and common areas, where we could meet other travellers. Nice place to stay during your South African travels.

title: Excellint tourist spot with great scenery
text:
At the entrance we found the entrance fee of 230 ZAR too expensive, but by the end of the day we changed our minds. There are 2 trails we visited inside the NP. One led us to the Suspension Bridge. The bridges and the way there are already nice, but there is a viewpoint-hike that starts from the last suspension bridge and takes all the way to the top of the hill next to it. Well, the view up there is what makes the experience worthwhile :)
The other trail took us to a waterfall. Most of the time there were no footpath, we had to climb on bigger-smaller rocks, we enjoyed it a lot. It leads along the ocean, so the view on the way is beautiful. 10/10
Oh 1 thing was really expensive about it - a beer in the restaurant..

title: Very nice beach with restaurants
text: Beach area of Port Elizabeth where we felt completely safe. There are many restaurants around. People were enjoying the beach, or had a nice walk along the ocean. There is a big pier that also offers nice views.

title: Nice spot in Port Elizabeth
text:
Lovely place in Port Elizabeth where the staff was helpful. We could park our car inside the yard. We felt safe here during our stay. The view to the harbour is nice. It is right next to the Fort Frederick, and a Mandela memorial is also nearby.
There are common places in the house where you can meet fellow travellers.
place: Island Vibe Port Elizabeth Harbour Master's House

title: Place with good sleep quality and close to nature
text:
A family run property that isnt too close to the city of Colesberg (you ride about 12km dirt road to access it). But they serve dinner and breakfast (not included in the price).
The staff is kind, the area is calm and relaxing. Nice pool is also available, and you can go down to the river (Orange) bank. They also have beer in their bar :)
2 negatives I could mention is that there was no WIFI, the floor was a bit noisy upstairs.
